trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The Nu Mou culinarian needs help with a pest problem.
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_TODO_00<tab>Place the sautéed mushroom soup as bait.
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait for the pest.
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_TODO_02<tab>Report to the Nu Mou culinarian.
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_000<tab>Nooo, not again! Grrr, a pox on that pest!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_001<tab>My, to appear before me precisely at my time of need! 'Tis as if you were a Nu Mou yourself!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_002<tab>It's my mushrooms─the precious mushrooms I grow with tender loving care. A dastardly pest has been laying them to waste!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_003<tab>It sneaks into the cave with its gluttonous, googly eyes, and devours my defenseless fungi before vanishing into the wilderness!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_004<tab>Rid me of the creature, I beg you! Lure it out using this bowl of sautéed mushroom soup, then strike it down!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_005<tab>Rid me of that dastardly pest, I beg you! Lure it out using the sautéed mushroom soup, then strike it down!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_010<tab>You did it! You rid me of the mushroom menace!
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_011<tab>Now my precious mushrooms may grow in peace, and I can sleep without those googly eyes haunting my dreams.
TEXT_LUCKZD003_03410_NUMOU03410_000_012<tab>Here is your fitting reward─no more and no less than you deserve. May it bring you much honor!
